item.title: About me
item.description:
You can learn more about me here.

I have spoken about MSF sometimes on this blog. I have worked for MSF sometimes in the field. Neither of the two are connected, and when I am working in the field, I do not post to the blog, because during those times, 100% of my life is MSF. It is the policy of MSF that we talk about our experiences according to the needs of our beneficiaries, and not as individuals.
